description: Experience saturation function parameters for the two-stage model

clinical.notes: Hard minimum of 100 hours filters applicants. Saturation around 400h reflects diminishing returns after substantial exposure.

research.notes: No minimum required. Higher tau reflects longer time to meaningful contribution. Research-intensive schools weight this more.

volunteer.notes: Soft minimum of 50 hours. Quick saturation reflects that extensive volunteering provides diminishing signal.

shadowing.notes: Very quick saturation - beyond 50h provides little additional signal. Soft minimum of 20h.

leadership.notes: Measured in number of significant leadership positions. Quick saturation after 2 roles.

publications.notes: Each subsequent publication worth diminishingFactor of the previous. First-author peer-reviewed most valuable.

notes: Total experience contribution E_i is sum of all domain contributions plus publication contribution. All values in logit units.
